title: Cannot use my mini map to move my camera. How do I fix it?
body: I frequently rely on this ability to play league of legends, if anyone has any idea how to fix it I would appreciate it so much! Thanks

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, certain app notifications can cause this to happen. I recommend temporarily [turning off app notifications](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4111-notifications-apps-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if this helped.
